products.title: Cherbourg Like a Local: Customized Private Tour
products.description: With our walking tours, you’ll skip the mundane historical tours and discover the city through a local’s eyes. Experience a tour that will transform the way you travel to make it as much about the people you meet, as it is the places you see. Our local guides (Lokafyers) are passionate about their city and eager to share their knowledge and perspective. Since Lokafyers are not professional guides and tour occasionally, they provide an experience that’s authentic and personal, like a friend showing you around their city. By the end of the tour, you'll feel comfortable navigating the city and confident that you have all the information you need to make the most of your stay.

products.title: Private Transfer from Mont Saint-Michel to Rennes - Up to 7 People
products.description:
Let you drive and travel in a luxurious and comfortable minivan Mercedes from Mont Saint-Michel to Rennes.  

Rennes is located about 1.15 hour from Mont Saint-Michel. 

For your Mont Saint-Michel-Rennes Transfer, our professional english speaking drivers guarantee a punctual service available 7 days a week. 

The price is all include for a transfer up to 7 people.

products.title: Entrance ticket to the Battle of the Hedges Museum
products.description:
An ideal visit for families (1h30 approx.) in which everyone finds their interest during a course that is at the same time complete, lively and interactive. A museum with a unique atmosphere, full of emotion that takes you into the daily life of the 1940s with the soldiers but also the civilians.
(Re)discover a period sometimes forgotten and yet decisive on the road to Liberation... It took place a few weeks after June 6, 44, it was the Battle of the Hedges...
Through 27 hyperrealistic sound stages, you will discover a collection of more than 15,000 authentic objects and old military vehicles, discover the days after D-Day and take part in this tribute to the civilians and soldiers who fell in the Normandy countryside. .

products.title: Airborne Museum Admission Ticket
products.description:
Located in the centre of Sainte-Mere-Eglise and only a few kilometers from Utah Beach and the landing beaches, the Airborn Museum facing the bell tower on which paratrooper John Steele was suspended on the D-Day.

Through spectacular museography, the Airborne Museum will make you live the D-Day alongside the American paratroopers of the 82nd and 101st Airborne. Discover an exceptional collection of historical artifacts, an authentic glider and a C-47 aircraft that participated in the D-Day operations.

products.title: All-terrain electric scooter rental in Mont-Saint-Michel
products.description: If you want to get away from it all in nature, to discover magnificent landscapes and to feel sensations as yet unknown. This experience is for you. The all-terrain electric scooter is the ideal machine for fun and effortless rides. Explore the marvelous landscapes. You will have the opportunity to visit the entire bay of Mont-Saint-Michel with less effort and with unique sensations.

products.title: Normandy Mont-Saint-Michel Abbey Entrance Ticket
products.description: Discover the Abbey of Mont-Saint-Michel with its unique medieval architecture and religious history. Explore this UNESCO world heritage site by visiting the Abbey, the cloister sooth and the terrace where you can enjoy an unforgettable view of the bay.

products.title: Normandy: Mont-Saint-Michel Private Walking Tour
products.description:
Discover the history of Mont-Saint-Michel, from the Hundred Years' War to the French Revolution, on a fascinating walking adventure. Join your private guide to discover the area and take in the stunning Romanesque architecture perched on top of the cliffs contrasting with the surrounding marshland.

Arrive in Normandy and meet your guide outside the castle for a trip back in time as you walk around this outstanding site, dating back to the medieval era. Make the most of your guide's knowledge and expertise to customize your experience to your specific needs.

Explore the many wonders of this UNESCO World Heritage Site, with the option to visit the historic abbey, which served both as a pilgrimage site and a prison back in the day.

products.title: 2-Hour Guided Walking tour of the Mont Saint Michel
products.description:
Meet your tour guide and experience a 2H guided walking tour in the streets of the old village of Mont Saint Michel
Explore the narrow, cobblestone streets and ramparts and be amaze with the splendid view of the bay from the top of the village.
Your tour will finish at the top of the Mont Saint Michel and from there you can visit the Abbey at your own pace ( Ticket is included in the tour ). 
This journey to the Mont Saint Michel will be surely a memorable experience.
